title: S5 Ep48: The Coachella Experience with Remi Bader: Thursday, April 21, 2022

description:
- Sofia Richie Engaged to Elliot Grainge (E!) (16:40) 
- Scott Disick Hangs With Former Kardashian Friend Larsa Pippen in Miami (Page Six) (23:29) 
- Jada Pinkett Smith Addresses Slap in ‘Red Table Talk’ Return (Page Six) (32:40) 
- Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra’s Baby Name Revealed (Page Six) (42:24) 
- Netflix’s World Has Been Turned Upside Down as Stock Plunges 35% (CNN Money) (48:33) 

The Morning Toast with Claudia (@girlwithnojob) and Remi Bader (@remibader)
